citations.narrative:
G7 Kitchen: Open plastic bags of dried papaya (#1) and dried pineapple (#1) were inside a storage container that did not
have its lid in place; the lid was underneath the storage container. The dried fruit is food enrichment for the non-human
primates.
Per this Section, open supplies of food must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent spoilage and
contamination. Improper storage of food items can affect the nutritive value and palatability of the food. The research
facility corrected this item during the inspection by placing each open bag of dried fruit into storage containers with a
tightly sealed lid. To remain corrected from this date 10/30/24 forward.
This inspection was conducted with facility representatives from 10/28/24 through 10/30/24. The exit briefing was held
with facility representatives on 10/30/24.
n

narrative:
3.75(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
G7 Kitchen: Open plastic bags of dried papaya (#1) and dried pineapple (#1) were inside a storage container that did not 
have its lid in place; the lid was underneath the storage container. The dried fruit is food enrichment for the non-human 
primates. 
 
Per this Section, open supplies of food must be kept in leakproof containers with tightly fitting lids to prevent spoilage and 
contamination. Improper storage of food items can affect the nutritive value and palatability of the food. The research 
facility corrected this item during the inspection by placing each open bag of dried fruit into storage containers with a 
tightly sealed lid. To remain corrected from this date 10/30/24 forward. 
 
This inspection was conducted with facility representatives from 10/28/24 through 10/30/24. The exit briefing was held 
with facility representatives on 10/30/24.
